entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
